reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and comfortable, with a great fit and nice color options.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Fit is great, color is beautiful (green), and the pattern on this comfortable sweater has received compliments for being unique. It is lightweight for a winter sweater, great for late fall early winter in TN when temps are 30-45 with a coat and for when it is even colder if worn with a thicker winter coat when outside. I went up a size because I like my sweaters roomier and did not know for sure what to expect, I could have stayed with my normal size and it would have still fit well, just not as roomy as I like mine. I have washed it and there was a small amount of pilling on the chest, but it is unknown if it was just from washing or because it rubbed against some things briefly and the wash just made it show a little. I still feel it was a good value for what I paid and you have to be very close to notice the small amount of pilling. Read more
items.author: M’Shell A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars XXL fits nicely on a 16/18.
items.body: Soft & Cozy-washes well. XXL fits nicely on a 16/18. Very stylish and garners many compliments. Read more
items.author: Nicole S

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute black & white sweater
items.body: This sweater feels so good and comfortable. The size is bigger than average a smaller size will fit better. The color is beautiful and nicely designed. Unfortunately it will not work for me. Read more
items.author: Rachel M Carroll

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a boring gray
items.body: This was described as oversized so I went down one size. It fits the way I like. Did not shrink after being washed and dry. Nice weight and still large enough to add a tank underneath. Been looking for a gray sweater that had some detail beyond the usual crew or v neck, nice styling. Read more
items.author: br florals

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and light, launders well but shrinks as expected
items.body: This sweater is very soft and light enough for cool Fall days. It runs a little big so I threw it in the washer and dried it in the dryer and it now fits. It looks great after that process too. So if it fits when you get it you better follow the instructions! Read more
items.author: Jo Foster

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Returning
items.body: Material feels cheap and overall poorly made. While not overly expensive, it’s not worth the price tag. Read more
items.author: Mak

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ridiculous creases and folds
items.body: Sweater is nice but I can’t get the creases/folds out of the sweater. The folds suggest the sweater was hot ironed and placed in air tight plastic bag. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it
items.body: Ordered the sweater in the green. I’m a size 10/12 and ordered the medium. It fit perfect. The sweater is not too heavy and fairly soft. Read more
items.author: Linda Q

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Gray, White, Blue, Apricot, Smoke Gray, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
